entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Emerson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Emerson 01:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -21.6°C
Wind: NNW 49 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
